content: last sq ch6 fsc single_crochet ch6 slip_stitch into 16th st behind the hook ch3 slip_stitch into 2nd st of next mw 2 times ch6 fsc single_crochet ch6 slip_stitch into 16th st behind the hook ch3 slip_stitch into 2nd st of next mw ch6 step 8 * return row foundation row 3 times return row tall foundation row repeat from * until there are 12 row of sqs step 9 last 13th set of sqs return row foundation row 3 times last row fsc 7sc slip_stitch around ch3 ch3 slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 2 times slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch6 4 *continue to next sq slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 3 times slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch6 repeat from * 1 more time last sq slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 2 times slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 step 10 finish left edge continuing around same sq fsc 7sc slip_stitch around ch3 ch3 slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 2 times slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch6 *continue to next sq slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 3 times slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch6 repeat from * to last sq last sq slip_stitch around next vch 6sc in next fr slip_stitch around next vch ch3 3 times slip_stitch into same st on next mw fasten_off yarn copyright 2023 lisa hounshell 5
